widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Codes Crosslinking:
config.description: As you may know, Justia provides yearly historical versions of the U.S. Code for all the States. The codes are accessible for free, and visitors can read, research, and compare the laws passed by the U.S. Congress in previous years. Well, now it's much easier to compare the latest versions with just the click of a button.

config.title: Jury Instructions 2020 Version:
config.description: Our team monitors key analytics in our portals to have essential insights regarding performance and improvement opportunities. We noticed that the California Civil & Criminal Jury Instructions pages are some of our portal's most popular pages. Last month, we updated the contents to be fresh and current for both our visitors and users.

config.title: Reviews Admin Tool:
config.description: In light of the recent Justia Amplify Review Tool launch last month, our team streamlined a process in the last few weeks to produce reviews by adding an internal review landing page generator. It will definitely provide a better experience for our team while setting these up.
